channel.title: How to make it when you unequip a item...Please help!
channel.description:
I want to make it so when you unequipped an item it refreshes your skills back to regular levels.
Example, i've made it so when you equip this amulet it gives your range and mage skills bonus levels, like : 100/80
But when you take it off it stays 100/80 until it drops to normal levels like a potion does. So i want to make it right when you take it off it makes your skills refresh. Thanks.
